pr_title: Code cleanup and remove redundant checks

timeline.message:
Code cleanup and remove redundant checks

This commit has follwing changes.
- Remove redundant instance of check and use null check
- Remove commented code segments
- Remove unused methods
- Use inverted fails fast if checks
Cleanup code and remove unused methods and vars

Code refactor and cleanup

This commit has the following changes.

- Remove unused methods
- Use collection API to add elements
- Rename loadExternalOrLocalType to loadLocalType

timeline.bodyText: I think we can use switch statement here.
timeline.author: riyafa

timeline.bodyText: We seemed to have a lot of static imports. This might be necessary in this place but I would like to point out this: https://stackoverflow.com/a/162195/3599535

replies.bodyText: It is not recommended by java
replies.author: riyafa

replies.bodyText: Ack. We will be cleaning this up once BString is migrated. This is one-to-one Ballerina to Java migration so thats why you are seeing static method imports.
replies.author: Kishanthan
